channel.title: Treks & Walks | NORTHEAST INDIA on North by Northeast Journeys | Active Travels in Northeast India
channel.description: Recent content in Treks & Walks | NORTHEAST INDIA on North by Northeast Journeys | Active Travels in Northeast India

item.title: Meghalaya: Walks in the clouds | WALKING HOLIDAY
item.description: Explorations in the ‘Abode of Clouds’ This Walking holiday takes you to beautiful Meghalaya, ‘The Abode of clouds’.

item.title: Arunachal Pradesh (East): Walks in India's far east | WALKING HOLIDAY
item.description: Walks in India’s far east Arunachal Pradesh, ‘the dawn lit Mountains’ is the easternmost state of India.

item.title: Sikkim & W Bengal: Singalila Ridge and the Barsey Rhododendron Sanctuary | TREKKING HOLIDAY
item.description: A Trek amongst the giants The hills of North Bengal and Sikkim are a mystical land of abundant natural beauty with verdant forests, quaint sub alpine villages and high towering mountains.

item.title: Arunachal Pradesh (West): The high lakes trek | TREKKING HOLIDAY
item.description: Ridge running along the Bhutanese frontier This particular trek is set in Western Arunachal Pradesh, in the states Buddhist belt close to the tri-junction between India, Tibet and Bhutan.
